attributes.action: Establish a no fly zone over Ukraine to protect it from air attacks by Russia
attributes.additional_details: A war is raging in one of the capitals of Europe. The Ukrainian army is considerably less resourced, skilled or supplied than the Russian army especially when it comes to anti missile ammunition and capabilities. Ordinary people have taken up arms to fight for their freedoms but Russia is attacking all cities and residential areas from the air. Ukrainians need our help. They are fighting so we in the UK don’t have to but we must stand up for our values.
attributes.background: To consider providing military air support to the government of Ukraine by shielding its sky to prevent air missiles and bombardements to give Ukrainian army a chance to fight!

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Pledge any necessary military support to defend Ukraine: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/607314

Seek to impose a no-fly zone over Ukraine: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609437
